attributes.action: Make life for Animals that are being tested on better.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There are thousands of animals that are tested on, i hate them suffering but i feel it is necessary for vital medicinces, however cosmetic testing should stop. I want the conditions of the animals to be made better, people handling them, outside spaces for them to run around in ect. i feel so strongly about making their lifes better, afterall they are suffering for us to live.
if you feel the same way as me then please sign my petition.
thanks Lucie
